product_name: The North Face Alpenglow II Winter Boots - Kids'
long_description: The waterproof Alpenglow II winter boots from The North Face offer protection from chilly winter weather in a convenient slip-on design. Uppers are made from recycled PET (plastic soda bottles) polyester, and polyurethane-coated leather overlays offer lightweight, flexible performance. Seam-sealed construction delivers waterproof protection against slushy snow. Removable felt liners provide insulation; comfort rated to -25degF during active use. The North Face Alpenglow boots are easy to slip on and off; elastic cords over the insteps provide a secure fit. Locking bungee cords at the collars prevent snow entry. Durable thermoplastic rubber shell bottoms and outsoles on The North Face Alpenglow II winter boots keep slush at bay and provide great winter traction.
short_description: The waterproof Alpenglow II winter boots from The North Face offer protection from chilly winter weather in a convenient slip-on design.
